dialogue.speaker: BIANCA
dialogue.text: Can we make this quick?  Roxanne Korrine and Andrew Barrett are having an incredibly horrendous public break- up on the quad.  Again.

dialogue.speaker: CAMERON
dialogue.text: Well, I thought we'd start with pronunciation, if that's okay with you.

dialogue.speaker: BIANCA
dialogue.text: Not the hacking and gagging and spitting part.  Please.

dialogue.speaker: CAMERON
dialogue.text: Okay... then how 'bout we try out some French cuisine.  Saturday?  Night?
